function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Dependence on permits and services for park funding","category":"Supply chain disruptions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Emergence of demand for new services and perspectives on park management","category":"Pandemic impact on markets","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Differences in funding sources and management autonomy of public service agencies","category":"Lower investment","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited focus on green spaces within the public services office leading to neglect and underfunding","category":"Discontinuity of services","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential increase in health inequalities due to severe restrictions to mobility and park use during the covid-19 pandemic","category":"Pandemic impact on markets","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Wealthier residents less likely to increase their visits to green spaces during the covid-19 lockdown","category":"Lower employment","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Reliance on resistive heating sensors leading to energy consumption","category":"Resource and capability risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Dependency on energy-saving performance validation test for system effectiveness","category":"Resource and capability risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Cost-effectiveness of indoor climate on high-value work in the office","category":"Financial strains and liquidity crises","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Lack of awareness of economic impact of indoor climate","category":"Pandemic impact on markets","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inaccurate economic calculations for investments and operations","category":"Financial strains and liquidity crises","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Negative consequences of greater efficiency on indoor climate","category":"Financial strains and liquidity crises","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Pandemic events impacting global economies","category":"Pandemic impact on markets","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unpredictability and exogeneity of pandemic impacts","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of robot data beyond 2018 limits the analysis of pandemic impact on robot adoption","category":"Pandemic impact on markets","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Industry-level labor and capital-related data available only until 2014, limiting the analysis of pandemic impact","category":"Pandemic impact on instability","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Uneven impact of robots on workers with different skill levels","category":"Workforce and labor shortages","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Dependent on
